description: Consider number of prime divisors counted with multiplicity (A001222). Apply this function to C(n,k)'s. Find maximum and count its occurrence.
example: n=19, the A001222 spectrum for binomials C(n,k) is: {0,1,3,3,5,6,6,6,6,5,5,6,6,6,6,5,3,3,1,0}. The maximum arises 8 times, so a(19)=8.
author: _Labos Elemer_
